comment: Dr. Richey was an amazing teacher. The classroom was not just people listening to a lecture; the whole class was. She let everyone have their own time to speak and get to know the people in the class, even if it was awkward. She was very nice, and the class was so flexible for everyone's schedule !!!

Horrible experience. This entire semester was just up in the air the entire time and nothing was ever clear. She does not give instructions and never grades anything. We've had about 13 quizzes and none of them have been graded. She never answers emails either. Take someone else.

It's the end of the semester and I'm not sure what my grade is because she's only graded like 3 things so far. Do not take this teacher she is impossible to reach. I felt like overall this class did not contribute anything to my knowledge
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework

comment: Dr. Richey gives a significant amount of work weekly, including readings. I have spent multiple hours just on readings to get a discussion done. I have only received three grades for the whole semester and it is very disappointing due to the time and effort I have put into assignments. It seems she does not put grades in till the last week.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework--Lecture heavy

comment: She seems sweet but is very hard to get in contact with. Not a great online teacher. She forgets to post things, does not grade assignments quickly and does not email back fast. The works not hard but and is only due once every 2 weeks but there is a lot of it.

If I could give a zero I would. There was an immense amount of panic and frustration due to her lack of communication. She was in another country for a majority of the class and did not start to enter grades until the day before final grades were due. There was confusion on whether or not an assignment was required and we could not reach her.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework

comment: Professor Richey was sooo amazing! I took her online and her due dates and assignment expectations were clear. She will also work with you if you just email her although she's a little slow on grading, her assignments are easy.

Dr. Richey was understanding and supportive but still made us work. Not a hard grader and I actually enjoyed the readings for the most part. It was my favorite class.. she doesnt take attendance. No exams.

Dr. Richey was the most understanding professor I had this semester. She does weekly quizzes but gave us time to do them and submit online. She was so caring and helpful when I needed her. She accepts late work. An easy class if you show up and complete the paper and quizzes reflection.

Dr. Richey was just okay. We were assigned a million readings for quizzes that she would post online a day or so before they were due, which made them hard to get around to sometimes. Not the most understanding in the world and makes agreements she cant keep. Overall not awful, just be prepared to do the most for an easy class.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: Professor Richey is by far one of the best teachers I have ever had. She is caring and passionate about what she does. I took Education 2120 with Professor Richey this past Maymester in Italy as a study abroad program. She is an amazing teacher. You will not regret taking Professor Richey is truly one of the best Teachers I have ever had!!

Great teacher. She is caring and flexible with deadlines. Lots of reading and homework, weekly quizzes for hybrid class. Books arent textbooks but current issues. Very knowledgeable about education and culture. She likes to assign group projects and online discussions. I learned so much in this class.

I took the hybrid class, only meeting one day a week for an hour. She was vague about assignments and due dates, very biased in her lectures and took awhile getting grades back. 4 reflections total and a discussion board every week, along with a quiz during class. Did not require the textbook, but instead books you have to buy from Amazon.
